alert.note: Alert for Duplin; Inland Onslow; Jones; Northern Craven; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jones, southeastern Craven, northern Onslow and eastern Duplin Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Olympia to Petersburg. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Bern, Havelock, James City, Trent Woods, River Bend, Richlands, Maysville, Belgrade, Rhems, Petersburg, Croatan, Riverdale, Catfish Lake, Neuse Forest, Cherry Branch Ferry Terminal, Coastal Carolina Regional Airport, Deppe, Loco VFD and Pollocksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Duplin; Inland Onslow; Jones; Northern Craven; Southern Craven
